ComicInfo.Characters: Scott,Hulk (cameo flashback, arm and leg only),Hannah Washington [Ant],Savage Dragon (cameo flashback),Paige,Spawn (cameo flashback),Superman (cameo flashback)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:16:49 [Issue ID 4000-117376] urn:comicvine:4000-117376 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:26:45. [Issue ID 503659]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
The first major battle of Ant's return is over. Join Hannah in this standalone issue as the dust settles, wounds heal, and she finally gets some of the answers she has been searching for. Meanwhile, another threat is right around the corner.
Notes:
The cover is a homage to the cover of Spider-Man #1.
ComicInfo.Title: Moving On [Part One]
